body.p: Ebuild authors, developers in training and other interested parties are most welcome in Gentoo's new IRC channel #gentoo-dev-help, writes this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Developers willing to present their work at the European Gentoo developer conference are being reminded to answer the call for papers before the deadline, alongside some impressions from the community at large and other news. Complete with Bugzilla statistics and all of last week's GLSA security announcements!
